name: Chris Lake
text: Barely any cheese, toppings.. and cookie pizza was so burnt choc chips were black.. have you tasted burnt chocolate 🤮

name: Chad Walden
text: Best 3 cheese pepperoni pizza WITH parmesan I've ever had. GREAT SERVICE

name: Dustin Drake
text: Just a typical chain pizza place. Only dif is flavored crust. They don't say it but you can pick multiple also. Cajun/Sesame/Asiago is really great..!

name: Nancy Collins
text: I love this place.  I usually have the Turkey Club Sub, but have heard their pizza is great. I don't live close, but order food from there when I can. Everything has always been freshly prepared.

name: Amy Milimaki
text: Awesome staff, great food and even better prices!

name: Erynn Hatfield
text: Best Hungry Howies I've been too. Not overly greasy and was hot from the minute I got it to the minute I got home.

name: Duane Hall
text: Decent people decent food

name: April H
text: The food was hot and perfectly made! Delivery was really fast! To the young man who delivered our food, ( I wish I knew your name) you are extremely polite and delivered not only our delicious meal but you also delivered outstanding customer service!

name: Bee McLean
text: I haven't had a bad experience. They are affordable and consistently good.

name: Nicole Kendrick-Coale
text: Always...... great love their gluten free pizza

name: Jeffrey McGurk
text: The gentleman who took my order on July 28, 2020 was so professional and friendly that I felt compelled to write a positive review online. We appreciate the staff and management at this store, thank you for all your hard work.

name: RawrAthena
text: Screwed up order two times said they would deliver the right item and would be 30 mins and never showed up. Worst customer service ever

name: Logan Richardson
text: Bunch of middle schoolers trying to run a business. Called and placed a delivery order, 45 minutes later called me back saying they don’t deliver to my address even tho I’m less than 6 miles away. Manager sounds like he’s 14 and told me my order was cooked a good 30 minutes ago and I was welcome to come pick it up. Stay clear.

name: Kelly Van Y
text: Was told 45 minutes to receive my order. Waited an hour and 20 minutes to get it. Drove 10 minutes home to find my order wrong. Order a calzone without ham or bacon. Opened it up and it was loaded with ham and bacon. I will no longer do business with Hungry Howies. This is not the first time something like this has happened.

name: Michael Gibbons
text: Refused to answer the phone atv11:50 so a takeaway order could be placed. Just another example of employees refusing to go the distance only looking out for themselves and damn the owner!

name: Nicci Barber
text: Long drive for me but so worth it! Wish cadillac or closer would open a hungry howies

name: Susan Zink
text: Really good baked italian sub!

name: josie donaldson
text: Called order in , I live across less then 2 minutes. I ordered a med pizza for delivery when asked they charged me 20.20 for a 9.00 pizza. I called the store and said I never pd 5.00 delivery fee and he told me the store needs to be …More

text: Easy website pickup and delivery.

name: Cindy Smith
text: Best pizza in town.

name: Jacob Mann
text: They are hard working and the food is always in point!

name: Alexandria Richardson
text: Sad that this is a franchise and the name is being dragged though the mud by these individuals. Called for delivery and almost an hour later they let me know they don’t deliver to my address even tho my order was cooked 45 minutes ago. Embarrassing for hungry howies

text: Great service! We ordered 10 pizzas and they came fresh out of the oven. Everyone (21 people)  loved the pizza! The manager is very nice and helpful.

name: john nelson
text: Bad service. Don’t ever answer phone. Called when they’re open no answer for an hour.

name: Pamela Moffit
text: This was the worst place ever. I know it was the holiday weekend and they were busy but because you made me the wrong pizza I had to buy another pizza to replace your mess up. And all you do is give me a coupon for free  bread. Really not cool and it was a birthday celebration too.

name: Tod fourtwentyone
text: My option eat the box taste the same . Drove out of my way to grab this pizza was not impressed

name: Maegan Koch
text: Aside from really good food the woman working there was a riot. So much fun talking with her. I think she was one of the managers... Tammy I think... shoot I took too much time to post this and forgot her name.

name: Walter Ray
text: The folks at the Houghton Lake location do a Great job on getting the order done fast and correct.   We love this pizza after a long day on the lake.   Not having to cook is a Great thing.  Let Hungry Howie's do it for you.

name: Northern Michigan Adventures NMA
text: We live at least 15 mins away from the store! Im both surprised and pleased that they deliver all the way out by the spikehorn restaurant. Its always delivered in a timely manner and its always amazing. Deep dish is the way to go. They cook it perfect (a little extra) every time! Love this place!

name: Ken Aldrich
text: The steak was to perfection !

text: Good food cheap as well not so great customer service thowe

text: I went into the Hungry Howie pizza Houghton Lake and I had this lady a few times and I am nice and she well Bite your Head off and spit it out her name is Carrie and I found out she is the Manager but She should not treat her custumers like …More

text: Ordered 2 extra large pizzas one was cooked to perfection the other s veggie pizza seemed soggy and slightly undercooked.

name: Craig Silvers
text: They can't even get a order correct. They told me 15 minutes for delivery. I called actly 30 minutes later where is pizza? I thoight it was pickup. No i clearly stated delivery. Mananger hung up on me and said order from little ceasers.  That's real professional. Maybe need a new Manager.

name: Kevin Wheaton
text: I downloaded the Howie app.  These guys are connected & up to speed for your online ordering!!!  No other place in Houghton Lake can you order online & its prepared as ordered & on-time!  5 stars guys! …More

name: Tess Cornell
text: Ordered calzones and the food just gets better every time we order! The only thing I can say is that it is very obvious the manager and the employees are taking pride in what they do. For a chain restaurant the food is as good as family owned. Proud to have you in our little town Keep up the good work and Thank you!

name: Tina Dansby

text: Horrible staff. Said it'd be 45min to an hour for our delivery to our hotel since we weren't in the room WAY before they said, the guy working was a total a** and said we'd have to come get our pizza now cause they already came. Such poor service and the worker was RUDE about everything!

name: cmill
text: My boyfriend and I ordered online, my order came sooner than I expected and with already cold mountain dew. I'm typically not a Hungry Howie's fan but the pizza and bread tasted delicious and went above my expectations! I seen a few …More

name: Jill Stromback
text: We ordered pizza from here for pick-up on Sunday night. Although there was a small hiccup with our order, the pizza was delicious and the service was excellent - specifically Joshua, who made sure we were happy with our order. Thank-you.

name: Elizabeth Stockman
text: Love their crust and they are always ready when you get there! Best tasting pizza.

text: Deep dish was excellent.  Tasty sauce awesome crust great flavor.  Will definitely order again!

name: Donna Vanderziel

name: Austin gaming

name: Kyle Ratliff
text: Lots of great people and food, Gary's daughter works there, tip her well it's he last week.

name: Dustin
text: Has the best pizza. There is only one table to sit at so it is best to get the pizza and find some where to else to to sit and eat. My family and i go to a park to eat and enjoy the views.

name: Jake Kardys
text: I don't know what happened, have had pizza from this Hungry Howie's several times before and no problem, tonight the pizza was horrible, very greasy and we actually didn't finish the pizza it was so bad. We have been eating Hungry Howie's since the 70's and it has always been great.
